about_the_game:
This DLC contains two PDFs with unique short stories from the world of 1428: Shadows over Silesia. Read on to embark on your next adventure with Hynek and Lothar. The stories are available in two languages - Czech and English.

1. Open Steam and find 1428: Shadows over Silesia in your Library games list.
2. Right-click on the game's icon, select Properties and click the Local Files tab.
3. Click the Browse Local Files... button.
4. Find the PDF file inside the "Bonus stories" folder.

This content is only available as part of the Deluxe Edition.

content_descriptors.notes: The text includes rude speech, violence and sexual content.

detailed_description:
This DLC contains two PDFs with unique short stories from the world of 1428: Shadows over Silesia. Read on to embark on your next adventure with Hynek and Lothar. The stories are available in two languages - Czech and English.

1. Open Steam and find 1428: Shadows over Silesia in your Library games list.
2. Right-click on the game's icon, select Properties and click the Local Files tab.
3. Click the Browse Local Files... button.
4. Find the PDF file inside the "Bonus stories" folder.

This content is only available as part of the Deluxe Edition.
